Text: for one it took me 16 hours to download no one apparently felt like sharing their upload apparently and two you need to either find a patch or never use your aircrafts gun because if you do it insta crashes tried 5 times now same result hit the button for a second ctd... so download at your own risk and if you do don't expect it to be short thing is 7 gigs and i only managed 150kb/s at the most for download rate >.>
